description.zh-cn: 位于亚洲西南部、阿拉伯半岛东南的联邦制君主国，由七个酋长国组成。
description.en: A federal monarchy in Western Asia, at the southeast end of the Arabian Peninsula, composed of seven emirates.

description.zh-cn: 阿拉伯联合酋长国中面积最大的酋长国，其首府阿布扎比亦为国家首都。
description.en: The largest emirate in the United Arab Emirates, whose capital, Abu Dhabi, is also the national capital.

description.zh-cn: 阿拉伯联合酋长国的成员国之一，其首府迪拜是阿联酋最大的城市。
description.en: One of the constituent emirates of the United Arab Emirates; its capital, Dubai, is the largest city in the UAE.

description.zh-cn: 阿拉伯联合酋长国的成员国之一。
description.en: One of the constituent emirates of the United Arab Emirates.

description.zh-cn: 阿拉伯联合酋长国中面积最小的酋长国。
description.en: The smallest of the constituent emirates of the United Arab Emirates.

description.zh-cn: 阿拉伯联合酋长国的成员国之一。
description.en: One of the constituent emirates of the United Arab Emirates.

description.zh-cn: 阿拉伯联合酋长国的成员国之一。
description.en: One of the constituent emirates of the United Arab Emirates.

description.zh-cn: 阿拉伯联合酋长国的成员国之一，于1972年加入联邦。
description.en: One of the constituent emirates of the United Arab Emirates, which joined the federation in 1972.

nodes.id: 穆罕默德·本·扎耶德·阿勒纳哈扬

zh-cn: 穆罕默德·本·扎耶德·阿勒纳哈扬

description.zh-cn: 阿拉伯联合酋长国现任总统、阿布扎比酋长国酋长。
description.en: The current President of the United Arab Emirates and Ruler of Abu Dhabi.

nodes.id: 穆罕默德·本·拉希德·阿勒马克图姆

zh-cn: 穆罕默德·本·拉希德·阿勒马克图姆
穆罕默德·阿勒马克图姆

description.zh-cn: 阿拉伯联合酋长国现任副总统兼总理、迪拜酋长国酋长。
description.en: The current Vice President and Prime Minister of the United Arab Emirates, and Ruler of Dubai.

nodes.id: 扎耶德·本·苏尔坦·阿勒纳哈扬

zh-cn: 扎耶德·本·苏尔坦·阿勒纳哈扬

description.zh-cn: 阿布扎比酋长国前酋长，在推动阿拉伯联合酋长国成立过程中发挥了核心作用，被认为是阿联酋国父。
description.en: Former ruler of Abu Dhabi who played a central role in the formation of the United Arab Emirates and is considered the Father of the Nation.

nodes.id: 拉希德·本·赛义德·阿勒马克图姆

zh-cn: 拉希德·本·赛义德·阿勒马克图姆

description.zh-cn: 迪拜酋长国前酋长，利用石油收入推动迪拜经济多元化，为迪拜成为现代化城市奠定基础。
description.en: Former ruler of Dubai who used oil revenues to drive the emirate's economic diversification, laying the foundation for Dubai to become a modern city.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲国家。曾在19世纪至20世纪期间作为停战诸酋长国的保护国，对该地区有重要影响。
description.en: A European country. It acted as the protecting power for the Trucial States from the 19th to the 20th century, exerting significant influence in the region.

description.zh-cn: 位于波斯湾南岸的酋长国联盟，是阿拉伯联合酋长国的前身。自1892年起成为英国的保护国，直至1971年独立并组建阿联酋。
description.en: A confederation of sheikhdoms on the southern coast of the Persian Gulf, the predecessor to the United Arab Emirates. It was a British protectorate from 1892 until it gained independence and formed the UAE in 1971.

description.zh-cn: 英国前首相。其政府于1968年1月宣布决定终止与停战诸酋长国的条约关系，启动了英国从该地区撤军的进程。
description.en: Former Prime Minister of the United Kingdom. His government announced in January 1968 the decision to terminate the treaty relationship with the Trucial States, initiating the process of British military withdrawal from the region.

description.zh-cn: 英国前首相。其政府于1971年3月再次确认了终止与停战诸酋长国条约关系的决定。
description.en: Former Prime Minister of the United Kingdom. His government reconfirmed the decision to terminate the treaty relationship with the Trucial States in March 1971.

description.zh-cn: 亚洲西部的国家。在阿联酋独立前夕占领了通布群岛，并与沙迦就阿布穆萨岛达成租赁协议。
description.en: A country in Western Asia. It occupied the Tunb Islands on the eve of the UAE's independence and reached a lease agreement with Sharjah over Abu Musa island.

description.zh-cn: 位于波斯湾的岛屿，在1971年12月1日被伊朗军队占领。
description.en: Islands in the Persian Gulf occupied by Iranian forces on December 1, 1971.

description.zh-cn: 位于波斯湾的岛屿，沙迦酋长哈立德曾与伊朗达成协议，将其租予伊朗。
description.en: An island in the Persian Gulf, which Sheikh Khalid of Sharjah agreed to lease to Iran.

description.zh-cn: 位于阿拉伯半岛的国家。曾与阿布扎比就大片领土存在主权争议，后于1974年签署边界协议。
description.en: A country on the Arabian Peninsula. It had a sovereignty dispute with Abu Dhabi over large territories, which was addressed by a border agreement signed in 1974.

description.zh-cn: 由波斯湾沿岸的阿拉伯国家组成的区域性政府间政治和经济联盟。阿联酋是其创始成员国之一。
description.en: A regional, intergovernmental political and economic union of Arab states bordering the Persian Gulf. The UAE is one of its founding members.

description.zh-cn: 由阿拉伯世界国家组成的区域性组织。
description.en: A regional organization of Arab states in and around North Africa, the Horn of Africa and Arabia.

description.zh-cn: 全球性的政府间国际组织。
description.en: A global intergovernmental organization.

description.zh-cn: 1892年英国与停战诸酋长国签署的协议，将后者置于英国的保护之下，规定其不得与英国以外的国家建立外交关系或出让领土。
description.en: Agreements signed in 1892 between the United Kingdom and the Trucial States, placing the latter under British protection and stipulating that they could not establish diplomatic relations with or cede territory to any country other than Britain.

description.zh-cn: 指20世纪50年代末至60年代初在停战诸酋长国（今阿联酋）境内发现并开始出口商业性石油的系列事件，这彻底改变了该地区的经济面貌。
description.en: Refers to the series of events from the late 1950s to the early 1960s involving the discovery and initial export of commercial oil in the Trucial States (now the UAE), which completely transformed the region's economy.

nodes.id: 阿布扎比海洋石油公司

zh-cn: 阿布扎比海洋石油公司

description.zh-cn: 由英国石油与法国石油公司合作成立的石油公司，于1958年在阿布扎比海域的乌姆谢伊夫发现了停战海岸地区首个商业性油气。
description.en: An oil company formed as a joint venture between BP and Compagnie Française des Pétroles, which discovered the first commercial oil and gas in the Trucial Coast at Umm Shaif, offshore Abu Dhabi, in 1958.

nodes.id: 海岸停战石油开发公司

zh-cn: 海岸停战石油开发公司

description.zh-cn: 伊拉克石油公司的运营公司，于1960年在阿布扎比陆上发现了可商用石油。后更名为阿布扎比石油公司。
description.en: An operating company of the Iraq Petroleum Company, which discovered commercially viable oil onshore in Abu Dhabi in 1960. It was later renamed the Abu Dhabi Petroleum Company.

description.zh-cn: 1892年的“专属协定”将停战诸酋长国置于英国的保护之下。
description.en: The 'Exclusive Agreements' of 1892 placed the Trucial States under British protection.

description.zh-cn: 根据1892年的“专属协定”，停战诸酋长国成为英国的保护国，英国负责其防务和外交事务，直至1971年条约终止。
description.en: Under the 'Exclusive Agreements' of 1892, the Trucial States became a British protectorate, with Britain handling their defense and foreign affairs until the treaty's termination in 1971.

description.zh-cn: 其领导的英国政府宣布决定终止与停战诸酋长国的条约关系，从而结束了英国的保护国地位。
description.en: His government announced the decision to terminate the treaty relationship with the Trucial States, thereby ending its status as a British protectorate.

description.zh-cn: 阿布扎比酋长国是1971年12月2日组成阿拉伯联合酋长国的六个创始酋长国之一。
description.en: The Emirate of Abu Dhabi was one of the six founding emirates that formed the United Arab Emirates on December 2, 1971.

description.zh-cn: 迪拜酋长国是1971年12月2日组成阿拉伯联合酋长国的六个创始酋长国之一。
description.en: The Emirate of Dubai was one of the six founding emirates that formed the United Arab Emirates on December 2, 1971.

description.zh-cn: 沙迦酋长国是1971年12月2日组成阿拉伯联合酋长国的六个创始酋长国之一。
description.en: The Emirate of Sharjah was one of the six founding emirates that formed the United Arab Emirates on December 2, 1971.

description.zh-cn: 阿治曼酋长国是1971年12月2日组成阿拉伯联合酋长国的六个创始酋长国之一。
description.en: The Emirate of Ajman was one of the six founding emirates that formed the United Arab Emirates on December 2, 1971.

description.zh-cn: 富查伊拉酋长国是1971年12月2日组成阿拉伯联合酋长国的六个创始酋长国之一。
description.en: The Emirate of Fujairah was one of the six founding emirates that formed the United Arab Emirates on December 2, 1971.

description.zh-cn: 乌姆盖万酋长国是1971年12月2日组成阿拉伯联合酋长国的六个创始酋长国之一。
description.en: The Emirate of Umm Al Quwain was one of the six founding emirates that formed the United Arab Emirates on December 2, 1971.

description.zh-cn: 哈伊马角酋长国于1972年1月10日正式加入阿拉伯联合酋长国联邦。
description.en: The Emirate of Ras Al Khaimah officially joined the federation of the United Arab Emirates on January 10, 1972.

relationships.source: 穆罕默德·本·扎耶德·阿勒纳哈扬

description.zh-cn: 穆罕默德·本·扎耶德·阿勒纳哈扬于2022年就任阿拉伯联合酋长国总统。
description.en: Mohamed bin Zayed Al Nahyan assumed the presidency of the United Arab Emirates in 2022.

relationships.source: 穆罕默德·本·扎耶德·阿勒纳哈扬

description.zh-cn: 穆罕默德·本·扎耶德·阿勒纳哈扬是阿布扎比酋长国的酋长。
description.en: Mohamed bin Zayed Al Nahyan is the Ruler of the Emirate of Abu Dhabi.

relationships.source: 穆罕默德·本·拉希德·阿勒马克图姆

description.zh-cn: 穆罕默德·本·拉希德·阿勒马克图姆于2006年就任阿拉伯联合酋长国副总统兼总理。
description.en: Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum became the Vice President and Prime Minister of the United Arab Emirates in 2006.

relationships.source: 穆罕默德·本·拉希德·阿勒马克图姆

description.zh-cn: 穆罕默德·本·拉希德·阿勒马克图姆是迪拜酋长国的酋长。
description.en: Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum is the Ruler of the Emirate of Dubai.

description.zh-cn: 1971年12月1日，伊朗军队武力占领了通布群岛。
description.en: On December 1, 1971, Iranian forces militarily occupied the Tunb Islands.

description.zh-cn: 沙迦酋长哈立德与伊朗达成协议，将阿布穆萨岛租予伊朗。
description.en: Sheikh Khalid of Sharjah reached an agreement with Iran to lease Abu Musa island to Iran.

description.zh-cn: 沙特阿拉伯曾声称对阿布扎比大片领土拥有主权，两国存在领土争端，直至1974年签署边界协议。
description.en: Saudi Arabia claimed sovereignty over large parts of Abu Dhabi's territory, leading to a territorial dispute that lasted until a border agreement was signed in 1974.

description.zh-cn: 阿拉伯联合酋长国是1981年5月成立的海湾合作委员会的创始成员国之一。
description.en: The United Arab Emirates was one of the founding members of the Gulf Cooperation Council, established in May 1981.

description.zh-cn: 阿拉伯联合酋长国于1972年12月6日加入阿拉伯联盟。
description.en: The United Arab Emirates joined the Arab League on December 6, 1972.

description.zh-cn: 阿拉伯联合酋长国于1972年12月9日成为联合国会员国。
description.en: The United Arab Emirates became a member of the United Nations on December 9, 1972.

description.zh-cn: 自1962年首次出口石油以来，石油的发现和开采极大地推动了阿联酋的经济发展，使其从荒芜的沙漠变为富庶的国家。
description.en: Since the first export of oil in 1962, the discovery and exploitation of petroleum have tremendously boosted the UAE's economic development, transforming it from a barren desert into a wealthy nation.

relationships.source: 阿布扎比海洋石油公司

description.zh-cn: 该公司于1958年3月在阿布扎比海域乌姆谢伊夫发现石油，这是停战海岸地区的首个商业性油气发现。
description.en: In March 1958, the company discovered oil at Umm Shaif offshore Abu Dhabi, marking the first commercial oil and gas discovery in the Trucial Coast region.

relationships.source: 海岸停战石油开发公司

description.zh-cn: 该公司于1960年10月27日在塔里夫附近发现了陆上可商用石油。
description.en: On October 27, 1960, the company discovered commercially viable oil onshore near Tarif.

relationships.source: 扎耶德·本·苏尔坦·阿勒纳哈扬

description.zh-cn: 随着石油收入的增长，阿布扎比酋长扎耶德·阿勒纳哈扬开始推进大规模建设项目，兴建学校、住宅、医院与道路。
description.en: With growing oil revenues, Sheikh Zayed of Abu Dhabi began to advance large-scale construction projects, building schools, housing, hospitals, and roads.

relationships.source: 拉希德·本·赛义德·阿勒马克图姆

description.zh-cn: 在1969年迪拜开始出口石油后，酋长拉希德利用石油收入推动经济多元化，将迪拜建设成现代化城市。
description.en: After Dubai began exporting oil in 1969, Sheikh Rashid used the revenue to drive economic diversification, building Dubai into a modern city.
